Package me.lokka30.microlib.maths

Class Randoms

java.lang.Object
me.lokka30.microlib.maths.Randoms
public class Randoms extends Object
This class contains a bunch of methods that make it simpler to use random numbers, booleans, and chances.
Since:
2.4.0
